About me

The momment I understood what can be done with computers and programing, I was hooked.

I love the creative process, thinking up ideas for a new site or brand logo, e-commerce store and personal brands--is all fun to me, with the plus of I get paid to have fun. I love it all.

One of the pride I have is I can say that I help create individuals and businesses image on the web.

I never thought of myself as a developer ("what than what's your use?")...well I see myself as a creative and a problem-solver. The Developer side is the tools and techniques I use to be creative and solve problems.

Kickstarted my Freelance experience in 2018 working for non-profit orphrange.

Presently, working as a Freelance Front-end Developer and CMS Developer.

Future outlook is landing contracting with companies and or individual businesses. Finding a place to work and express myself.
